		<title>RBI allows more foreign stake in private sector banks </title>


		<description>MUMBAI (Reuters) - The Reserve Bank of India has allowed foreign banks higher shareholding in private sector lenders in the country under exceptional situations as it tweaked the guidelines, against the backdrop of norms on licensing of new banks.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=cnvvb4JDY8g:AZG_oq_Onlo:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=cnvvb4JDY8g:AZG_oq_Onlo:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=cnvvb4JDY8g:AZG_oq_Onlo:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=cnvvb4JDY8g:AZG_oq_Onlo:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=cnvvb4JDY8g:AZG_oq_Onlo:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~4/cnvvb4JDY8g" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~3/cnvvb4JDY8g/india-rbi-idINKCN0Y40M2</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://in.reuters.com/article/india-rbi-idINKCN0Y40M2?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</guid>
        <category>businessNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 12:40:20 +0530</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://in.reuters.com/article/india-rbi-idINKCN0Y40M2?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Insight - Modi reforms flicker in rural India, other big challenges remain</title>


		<description>RAMPARA KISANA, India (Reuters) - For Indian farmer Sompal Singh, the light bulb that flickers outside his mud hut home is a symbol of progress: the first time electricity from the grid has reached his remote village since independence in 1947.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=25-qgzucNfk:FTiUGvgAuS8:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=25-qgzucNfk:FTiUGvgAuS8:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=25-qgzucNfk:FTiUGvgAuS8:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=25-qgzucNfk:FTiUGvgAuS8:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=25-qgzucNfk:FTiUGvgAuS8:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~4/25-qgzucNfk" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~3/25-qgzucNfk/india-modi-insight-idINKCN0Y334T</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://in.reuters.com/article/india-modi-insight-idINKCN0Y334T?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</guid>
        <category>businessNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 12:38:03 +0530</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://in.reuters.com/article/india-modi-insight-idINKCN0Y334T?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>India 10-year bond yield at over 1-week high as consumer inflation accelerates</title>


		<description>MUMBAI (Reuters) - Indian benchmark bond yield rose to a more than one-week high on Friday after data showed consumer price inflation accelerated in April, raising expectations the Reserve Bank of India (RBI)would hold off on cutting rates at its policy review next month.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=IqmjuBOZlPA:YvRjqFxaBFU:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=IqmjuBOZlPA:YvRjqFxaBFU:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=IqmjuBOZlPA:YvRjqFxaBFU:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=IqmjuBOZlPA:YvRjqFxaBFU:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=IqmjuBOZlPA:YvRjqFxaBFU:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~4/IqmjuBOZlPA" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~3/IqmjuBOZlPA/india-bonds-idINKCN0Y409E</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://in.reuters.com/article/india-bonds-idINKCN0Y409E?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</guid>
        <category>businessNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 09:44:35 +0530</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://in.reuters.com/article/india-bonds-idINKCN0Y409E?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Asia shares slip, yen hovers near 2-week low on BOJ stimulus expectations </title>


		<description>TOKYO/SINGAPORE (Reuters) - Asian shares fell on Friday after a rocky performance on Wall Street, while the yen hovered near two-week lows as traders wagered the Bank of Japan will add to its massive stimulus before too long.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=HVefv4If8vc:ywHvZdUOWqM:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=HVefv4If8vc:ywHvZdUOWqM:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=HVefv4If8vc:ywHvZdUOWqM:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=HVefv4If8vc:ywHvZdUOWqM:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=HVefv4If8vc:ywHvZdUOWqM:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~4/HVefv4If8vc" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~3/HVefv4If8vc/global-markets-idINKCN0Y408R</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://in.reuters.com/article/global-markets-idINKCN0Y408R?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</guid>
        <category>businessNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 11:49:26 +0530</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://in.reuters.com/article/global-markets-idINKCN0Y408R?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>MSCI announces changes to U.S., China, emerging market indexes</title>


		<description>(Reuters) - U.S. index provider MSCI announced changes to a number of its index funds on Thursday, including adding four securities and removing one from its U.S. large-cap index.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=jDNlJcLxWrM:qmQ0gZXSey0:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=jDNlJcLxWrM:qmQ0gZXSey0:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=jDNlJcLxWrM:qmQ0gZXSey0:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=jDNlJcLxWrM:qmQ0gZXSey0:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=jDNlJcLxWrM:qmQ0gZXSey0:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~4/jDNlJcLxWrM" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~3/jDNlJcLxWrM/msci-indexes-idINKCN0Y40AR</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://in.reuters.com/article/msci-indexes-idINKCN0Y40AR?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</guid>
        <category>businessNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 09:58:43 +0530</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://in.reuters.com/article/msci-indexes-idINKCN0Y40AR?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>India's retail inflation snaps easing trend, interest rates seen on hold  </title>


		<description>NEW DELHI (Reuters) - India's headline inflation broke a recent slowing trend in April, reducing the odds of further interest rate cuts next month by the Reserve Bank of India, even as industrial output expanded at a much-slower-than expected pace in March.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=ULseGullTTs:jLJMuWQL1AM:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=ULseGullTTs:jLJMuWQL1AM:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=ULseGullTTs:jLJMuWQL1AM:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=ULseGullTTs:jLJMuWQL1AM:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=ULseGullTTs:jLJMuWQL1AM:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~4/ULseGullTTs" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~3/ULseGullTTs/india-economy-retail-inflation-idINKCN0Y31K4</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://in.reuters.com/article/india-economy-retail-inflation-idINKCN0Y31K4?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</guid>
        <category>businessNews</category>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 19:26:12 +0530</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://in.reuters.com/article/india-economy-retail-inflation-idINKCN0Y31K4?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Oil prices fall on stronger dollar; Russia warns of longer crude glut</title>


		<description>SINGAPORE (Reuters) - Oil prices dipped in early trading on Friday as a stronger dollar weighed and Russia warned that a global crude supply overhang could last into next year.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=MqbuSFYKzuw:4mJQmdaSksE:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=MqbuSFYKzuw:4mJQmdaSksE:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=MqbuSFYKzuw:4mJQmdaSksE:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=MqbuSFYKzuw:4mJQmdaSksE:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=MqbuSFYKzuw:4mJQmdaSksE:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~4/MqbuSFYKzuw" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~3/MqbuSFYKzuw/global-oil-idINKCN0Y4026</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://in.reuters.com/article/global-oil-idINKCN0Y4026?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</guid>
        <category>businessNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 09:22:14 +0530</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://in.reuters.com/article/global-oil-idINKCN0Y4026?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Gold eyes worst week since March on dollar strength</title>


		<description>MANILA (Reuters) - Gold edged higher on Friday after losing more than 1 percent in the prior session, but was on track for its biggest weekly decline since March as a firmer U.S. dollar cut the metal's appeal.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=Bpl2psQTziY:-caCCfCAbCE:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=Bpl2psQTziY:-caCCfCAbCE:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=Bpl2psQTziY:-caCCfCAbCE:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=Bpl2psQTziY:-caCCfCAbCE:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=Bpl2psQTziY:-caCCfCAbCE:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~4/Bpl2psQTziY" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~3/Bpl2psQTziY/global-precious-idINKCN0Y403T</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://in.reuters.com/article/global-precious-idINKCN0Y403T?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</guid>
        <category>businessNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 12:29:53 +0530</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://in.reuters.com/article/global-precious-idINKCN0Y403T?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>China to boost energy storage 10-fold to cut power waste - industry</title>


		<description>BEIJING (Reuters) - China is expected to raise its power storage capacity by ten-fold to 14.5 gigawatts by 2020, as the world's second-biggest economy tries to cut massive waste from renewable energy projects, an industry association said.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=J3YH6PqS6uo:xYKtFBxH2Pk:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=J3YH6PqS6uo:xYKtFBxH2Pk:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=J3YH6PqS6uo:xYKtFBxH2Pk:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=J3YH6PqS6uo:xYKtFBxH2Pk:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=J3YH6PqS6uo:xYKtFBxH2Pk:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~4/J3YH6PqS6uo" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~3/J3YH6PqS6uo/china-power-idINKCN0Y40BX</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://in.reuters.com/article/china-power-idINKCN0Y40BX?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</guid>
        <category>businessNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 10:19:05 +0530</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://in.reuters.com/article/china-power-idINKCN0Y40BX?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Monsanto, once M&A instigator, now in awkward role as possible target</title>


		<description>REUTERS - A year after Monsanto Co sparked a massive consolidation race in the agrochemical industry by bidding for a rival, the world's largest seed company now finds itself in the uncomfortable role of takeover target.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=XwPBgrW5lDg:LcozrxtCw3g:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=XwPBgrW5lDg:LcozrxtCw3g:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=XwPBgrW5lDg:LcozrxtCw3g:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?a=XwPBgrW5lDg:LcozrxtCw3g:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INbusinessNews?i=XwPBgrW5lDg:LcozrxtCw3g:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~4/XwPBgrW5lDg" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/INbusinessNews/~3/XwPBgrW5lDg/monsanto-m-a-bayer-idINKCN0Y40BF</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://in.reuters.com/article/monsanto-m-a-bayer-idINKCN0Y40BF?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</guid>
        <category>businessNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 10:11:49 +0530</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://in.reuters.com/article/monsanto-m-a-bayer-idINKCN0Y40BF?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
